meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the gross enlargement of an area of the body, especially the limbs, due to obstruction of the lymphatic vessels.
meanings.sent1: The elephantiasis made his leg swell to an enormous size.
meanings.sent2: She had to seek treatment for her elephantiasis to reduce the swelling in her arm.
meanings.sent3: Despite the inconvenience, his elephantiasis made him quite popular at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The elephantiasis of bureaucracy in the office stifled productivity.
meanings.sent5: The elephantiasis of the tree roots above ground was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The state of being affected by elephantiasis.
meanings.sent1: Her elephantiasis caused discomfort and limited mobility.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support those suffering from elephantiasis.
meanings.sent3: Although rare, his elephantiasis condition made him a unique character in town.
meanings.sent4: The elephantiasis of fear in the room was palpable.
meanings.sent5: The elephantiasis of joy in her heart was evident in her radiant smile.
